text: A typographical error or typo is a word that has been spelt wrong by accident. There are a few ways to make a typo: # Hitting the wrong key while typing. Example: "Tom amd Jane are friends." # Pressing the keys in the wrong order. Example: "Tom nad Jane are friends." # Forgetting to press a key. Example "Tom nd Jane are friends." # Holding a key too long, causing a letting to be typed twice. Example "Tom andd Jane are friends." Category:Typography
title: Typographical error
